data.title: Lunch date with the family
data.text: Food was good and the prices are reasonable too. The bartenders are not so good with the drinks but definitely recommend the food.

data.title: great downtown choice for anytime meal.
data.text: The luch specials are amaizing. They also have good drinks and good service. Great place to run out at lunch or take your time and enjoy the music

data.title: Not impressed
data.text: Food is ok. Service not so much. I don't speak spanish so i don't appreciate when people keep talking to me in that way. Very difficult to order a cocktail when there is only one girl out of 5 who knows how to make it.

data.title: Great Food and Sights after all these years
data.text: To be honest...I usually just go here for lunch. The seafood salad appetizer is all that I get, and its plenty for lunch...probably the freshest and best seafood salad out there. I usually eat at the bar where I also have the pleasure of the four hot bartenders that help make the place famous...sorry if I'm being a pig...Spanish hot is Spanish hot.

data.title: Local gem for lunch
data.text: Went with co-workers for lunch after a meeting. Pleasantly surprised by value and quality as well as variety of lunch menu. Had quite possibly the best grilled calamari I've had in a while!! Busy but quick service too!!

data.title: Good priced
data.text: Priced well. Good food. Service ok. If you don't speak Spanish you do Not get the same service or amount of food. Everyone at all other tables recieved bread and 3 peices of chicken except for us. We spent well over 100 bucks and were charged for all soft drink refills and told no bread and that's all the chicken that you get. However people after us got bread and all have 3 peices of chicken. We know that you suppose to get 3 because the people that we were with have gone a few times with there Latin friends and that what they have always gotten. So take it for what it's worth.

data.title: Excellent
data.text: This is my favorite restaurant. I'm never disappointed. Sangria is amazing. The service is outstanding. The skirt steak is loaded with great flavor.

data.title: Urban Eating!!
data.text: In the middle of this urban city is an awesome restaurant. I enjoyed Skirt steak with fresh broccoli and salad. My friend had Skirt Steak with spinach, black olives, peppers and onions served with rice and beans. The Guacamole was delicious.

data.title: Awesome Skirt Steak
data.text:
First time coming here, what a great local gem, this place was packed on a Saturday night. The outside looks like a unassuming bar, I'm sure at one point in the past it was just a bar. 
When a menu has a whole entire page dedicated to skirt steak - you must get it! Perfectly cooked, another one of those tricky cuts of meat to cook well - they have it down pat! 
We also had the chicharonnes, which for fried pork belly were not greasy at all! Octopus appetizer was cooked well - nice and tender! Sangria was OK - more wine and sprite than anything else. 
Wait staff were nice and attentive, but typically for this area, only speak Spanish - get to pointing!
Great, great place in Elizabeth, will definitely return!

data.title: Churrasco
data.text: I have yet to have a meal here I didn't like.  The churrasco/entrana (Skirt steak) is vooked to perfection.  If you're in the mood to share go for the Parrillada al patron.  I don't care for sweets but after trying their flan I was hooked.  They only sell it by the slice but they should look into selling a whole flan!

data.title: Excellent food
data.text: I have been here three times and each time is very good. The food is excellent. I get the chicken franchese and white rice. Some of the servers do not speak English very well, but that does not bother me because I speak Spanish. The drinks at the bar are good as well. The place is clean and everyone is very friendly.

data.title: Diner meets restaurant
data.text:
I found this place to be part diner, part restaurant. With typical diner fare and some 
Latin and European plates. It does also have a bar atmosphere. The food was fair to 
Satisfactory, not complicated. Service was friendly and tentative. The price was about 
Average for a diner and cheaper then a restaurant. The only small problem was the 
Parking, unless you don't mind walking a block and half.

data.title: friends together
data.text: food is good, service is good too. friendly waitresses, just waiting to satisfy each of us. Wine is good too. sometimes little noisy but it's ok.  The best positions are the tables near the windows.

data.title: Lovely tavern blue sangria!
data.text: typical paella and authentic dishes.  Casual.  Nice bar, friendly service, clean, park on the street. Popular

data.title: Very good, will definitely go back!
data.text: The guacamole was delicious and made right in front of us!  The mixed meat for two was delicious too!

data.title: City of Elizabeth thinks this is a Gem ?
data.text: bad place to eat or drink period. food really bad, if you don't check your bill clearly you may be charge for something you didn't ask for

data.title: Great local spot
data.text: Stopped in for dinner with a friend, the service was friendly, menu abundant and food delicious. So many steaks to choose from and reasonably priced. They serve hot bread with fresh garlic butter mmmmmm yummy and a great salsa. Would definitely return. They also serve great homemade sangria

data.title: Alot of Mediocre Food for an Inexpensive Price
data.text: Small cozy place that provides excellent service. The portions are very big and the prices very reasonable.  I had the plantains and found them lacking a sweet flavor. The fried calamari was okay. The chicken marsala was better when mixed with the rice. The marsala seemed like it had a light flavor which made eating it sort of bland. Overall not bad, but i feel like the food lacked a little flavor.

data.title: Good food but very loud
data.text:
Food is great there has been for years. Love their garlic butter on the warm loaf of bread. 
Great place to meet friends or go on a date just remember its very noisy loud music and people trying to talk over each other.

data.title: Great food not so great atmosphere
data.text: The entrana in this place is awesome! So is the shrimp cocktail (always fresh),the picada, and many other dishes. You can't go wrong with the food here.. The crowded dining area is the downfall along with some of the patrons.. If u can get over that and the noise, go there for great food & drinks at good prices..if somehow it could be more upscale it would be excellent, but I know the area
